<div align="center">
    <h2>{ what is this even? }</h2>
    <h3></h3>
</div>

This is my custom fork of **end_4's Hyprland dotfiles**.

I'm keeping this repo organized for contribution so I can easily share back any fixes or features I come up with by submitting **Pull Requests (PRs)** to the original project.

---

<div align="center">
    <h2>{ credit where credit's due }</h2>
    <h3></h3>
</div>

If you want the full scoop on features, official installation guides or the most stable version, please head over to the **original project**. It's lit no cap

**[end_4/dots-hyprland](https://github.com/end-4/dots-hyprland)**
